snippet.title: MIGHTREYA Publishing Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist MIGHTREYA on Steam: 505.games/WishlistMIGHTREYA  
 
MIGHTREYA is a thrilling anime-styled hero action game, set to launch in 2025 and  developed by sole Japanese indie developer Wazen. 

Players will step into the shoes of the unexpected hero Reya and her manager Nio as they navigate their roles as Hero Content Creators in a world suddenly besieged by monstrous beings from another dimension.  

💥 Experience sensational aerial combat against unexpected otherworldly threats 
💥 Follow an engaging cast through the fun and cheerful hero streamer's story! 
💥 Take advantage of 3 iconic weapons and over 30 unique actions and attacks 
💥 Explore 38 stages and face 24 enemy types 

- - -
 
Stay up to date with the latest news from these 505 Games lands by following us across our community channels:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Instagram: https://instagram.com/505_games
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/505games
Blog: https://505games.com/blog/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/505-games/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/505games
